facts: For 18 years, Karen has used a path across Larry's land to access the lake
The use was open and obvious to Larry
Larry never gave permission and objected several times
The prescriptive period in this jurisdiction is 20 years
asp_facts: property_claim(claim6). claimant(claim6, karen). respondent(claim6, larry). claim_type(claim6, prescriptive_easement). property_type(claim6, land). use_duration_years(claim6, 18). use_open(claim6, yes). use_continuous(claim6, yes). use_adverse(claim6, yes). permission_given(claim6, no). objections_made(claim6, yes). prescriptive_period(claim6, 20).
question: Has Karen acquired a prescriptive easement?
rationale: A prescriptive easement requires open, continuous, and adverse use for the full statutory period. Karen's 18 years of use is less than the required 20 years.
